attributes.action: ban the wearing of any football team's kit other than the teams you support (exceptions apply).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The heinous act of wearing any part of a football kit associated with a domestic team, other than the team you support, should be made illegal. 

Obviously, people can only support one domestic team per country.

It is preposterous to think that anyone would consider wearing a rival kit, however I have witnessed it and find it deeply offensive. I worry for the mental stability of anyone who would do this. 

The are some exceptions to this.
-Foreign domestic team's kits are acceptable.
-International team's kits are acceptable outside of tournaments involving the International team(s - plural due to people of mixed ethnicity) you support.
-Non-professional team's kits are acceptable.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
